name: 刘琪
bio_zh: 我目前是西北工业大学自动化学院一年级（2025-至今）硕士研究生，师从张鼎文教授。研究兴趣包括VLA，diffusion model
bio_en: I am currently a first-year Master's student (2025-Present) in the School of Automation at Northwestern Polytechnical University (NPU), advised by Professor Dingwen Zhang. My research interests include Vision-Language-Action (VLA) models and diffusion models.
